page.title: 14Moor End Farm
page.content: Moor End Farm is owned by Arthur Sykes, it covers 165 acres and is near South Crosland village. Mr. Sykes has three workers on his farm. In addition to his son,he has a man who drives the tractors and other machinery and a man who comes in to milk the cows. Mr. Sykes has 90 Friesian cows and a bull, 75 of which were milking when we visited the farm. He also has 70 calves. Last year the herd produced 12,750 gallons of milk, most of which was bottled and sold to five local milkmen, 30 gallons of milk a day is pasteurised. Any surplus milk is sold to the milk marketing board. Mr. Sykes uses his land to grow grass which he turns into silage to feed his cattle in winter. He buys compound cake to give to his animals. Mr. Sykes has been a farmer all his life.
